item.description:
We are hosting a monthly Rocky Hill Dog Park Playtime the first saturday of every month! What is a dog park playtime???
Best Friends opens the indoor doggy daycamp room for dogs to play, run around, expell energy and make new friends! We provide water, toys, music, refreshments and clean up. We do ask for a $5 donation to help raise funds for the future dog park to be built in Rocky Hill. 100% of the mooney collected is donated to the dog park funds.
If you have a freindly dog that loves going to dog parks........you are welcome to bring them to this meet-up! Vaccines required.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Rocky Hill Dog Park Playtime
